item.title: Report X-2024090752
item.description:
Report X-2024090752

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-15T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-04
  • City: ROCKLAND
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: BUCKET WAS DISCOVERED LEAKING BY PRELOADER/RESPONDER NATASHA CARTER. EMPLOYEE NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR. SUPERVISOR/RMP RESPONDED TO THE LEAKER. AFTER THE SPILL WAS SOLIDIFIED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP, THE GREEN BAG BEGAN TO SMOKE AND WAS WARM. THE BAG WAS BROUGHT OUTSIDE THE FACILITY AND AN OUTSIDE RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED.

item.title: Report E-2024090175
item.description:
Report E-2024090175

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-13T09:14:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-21
  • City: SACO
  • State: ME
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WHILE UNLOADING FREIGHT FROM TRAILER MATERIAL HANDLER DISCOVERED A PAIL THAT HAD BEEN SLIGHTLY PUNCTURED BY FREIGHT LOADED BEHIND IT AND PUSHED INTO IT. SPILLED MATERIAL WAS CLEANED WITH ABSORBENT AND PLACED INTO A RECOVERY CONTAINER AS WAS THE PUNCTURED PAIL.
